name: Bonebreaker Bob
description: Specializes in ethically questionable cuts at unbeatable prices.

name: Cleaver Carl
description: Known for their 'anything goes' approach to meat procurement.

name: The Crimson Cleaver
description: Offers a wide variety of exotic meats, some you might not want to ask about.

name: The Tenderizer
description: Their methods are a mystery, but their meat is undeniably tender.

name: The Crimson Claw
description: Claims their meat is sourced 'ethically.' Don't believe the hype.

name: The Meat Cleaver
description: Known for their 'no questions asked' policy.

name: The Chop Shop
description: Their motto: 'From farm to table... eventually.'

name: Cleaver Carl
description: Specializes in 'custom cuts.' Just don't ask what the custom is.
